issue.title: [MATLAB] Update documentation for the MATLAB Interface to reflect latest CMake build system changes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13204](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13204). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The MATLAB Interface should have clear documentation detailing how to build and run the interface on all platforms using the latest CMake build system changes merged in <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12004.>

The current documentation is out of date and is in need of some quality of life improvements as we transition toward building out the MATLAB interface beyond just supporting basic Feather file reading and writing.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13204?focusedCommentId=17489916) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12389
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12389>
